Tokheim Hengshan Technologies(Guangzhou)Co.Ltd. is the join venture co-invested by Tokheim S.A.S(France) and Guangzhou Hengshan Co. Ltd. with total investment of 120,000,000RMB.Hengshan is a paragon in Chinese fuel dispenser industry.

data.meta_site_name: Tokheim Hengshan Technologes(GuangZhou)CO.,LTD - Asia Wholesale Suppliers | asianavigator.com
data.text:
ADD YOUR COMPANY

Asianavigator.com is a groundbreaking global e-commerce platform that has completely revolutionized how businesses engage in online operations and trade.

With its headquarters situated in London, Asianavigator.com offers an extensive array of services catering to both business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-consumer (B2C) transactions. The platform provides personalized assistance to companies seeking buyers and suppliers, connecting millions of such entities from across the globe. This seamless connection fosters efficient and transparent trading on an immense scale.

The unparalleled success of Asianavigator.com can be attributed to its unwavering commitment to innovation and its relentless drive to empower small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Through a wide range of services and cutting-edge tools, the platform facilitates the expansion of businesses of all scales, granting them access to global markets and enabling their flourishing within the digital economy.

Asianavigator.com has emerged as a true trailblazer in the e-commerce industry, completely transforming conventional business models. Its influence extends far beyond the boundaries of China, leaving an indelible impact on the global business landscape and playing a pivotal role in shaping the future of commerce.

With features like "Add Your Company," Asianavigator.com allows businesses to showcase their offerings to a vast international audience. Whether it's seeking Asia wholesale suppliers or an auto telecom company, the platform offers an extensive network of reliable partners to meet diverse business requirements. Moreover, Asianavigator.com assists in discovering new manufacturing suppliers in Asia, fostering growth and expansion opportunities. With an extensive selection of products from Asia, the platform serves as a comprehensive marketplace for businesses to source high-quality goods.

In conclusion, Asianavigator.com stands as an innovative force in the e-commerce realm, empowering businesses worldwide and redefining the dynamics of online trade. With its commitment to SMEs and its extensive range of services, including "Add Your Company," Asia Wholesale Suppliers, Auto Telecom Company, New Manufacturing Suppliers in Asia, and Products from Asia, the platform continues to shape the future of global commerce while providing invaluable resources to enterprises of all sizes.

Dear user,

we would like to inform you that our website may personalise marketing content to your needs. In this connection, the personal data that we process is, for example, your IP address, data obtained from cookies or similar mechanisms on your device insofar as they allow you to be identified.

If you click the button "I consent to the processing of my personal data" or close this window, you consent to the processing of your data by the site owner and its trusted partners.

Your consent is voluntary. You have the right to: access, rectification and erasure of your data. You can find more information regarding the processing of your personal data in our Privacy Policy.

List of trusted partners:

Google - the website hosts Adsense and Google Analytics codes to display personalised content and collect information about user behaviour in order to improve the website.

Facebook - Facebook code is included on the site to display the comment box and side panel.

This is a demo script where all users have access to the Admin Panel. Therefore, in the panel, they can see your login, IP address and other data (without your email address) if you register on the site or take any other action. Please bear this in mind.
